definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: Safety voltage, use is convenience, Average life is 1000h.
sentences.chinese: 安全电压，使用方便，平均寿命1000小时。

sentences.english: Captain tell you the life expectancy for pilots around here?
sentences.chinese: 上校告诉你们飞行员的平均寿命有多长吗？
非洲象的平均寿命大约为70年。

sentences.english: Japan also tops world life expectancy list for women with 86 years.
sentences.chinese: 日本同时也是女性平均寿命最长的国家，为86岁。

sentences.english: it's a pity that I'm going to die or die too soon, but at least I'm getting more than the average.
sentences.chinese: 我死得太早是很遗憾，但至少我活得比平均寿命长。

sentences.english: On average, women live six to eight years longer than men globally.
sentences.chinese: 就全球而言，女子的平均寿命比男子要长六到八年。

sentences.english: The average monarch lives about nine months .
sentences.chinese: 黑脉金斑蝶的平均寿命是9个月。

sentences.english: A typical life span for Sumatran orangutans is 40 to 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 苏门答腊猩猩的平均寿命在40到50岁。

sentences.english: As a result, these people tend to be smaller and also live a longer-than-average life span.
sentences.chinese: 结果是这些人往往体形较小并且平均寿命较长。

sentences.english: Right-handers live, on average, nine years longer than lefties.
sentences.chinese: 用右手的人平均寿命比左撇子要长大约9年。

sentences.english: Four of the five counties are the same for both men and women.
sentences.chinese: 其中四个郡县男人和女人的平均寿命相同。

sentences.english: One of my favorite metrics is life expectancy.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的一个指标是平均寿命。

sentences.english: In captivity, two years is the average span.
sentences.chinese: 被人掳获的平均寿命为两年。

sentences.english: People in certain professions have a tendency to live longer than average.
sentences.chinese: 从事某些行业的人的寿命有比平均寿命长的倾向。

sentences.english: It's so comfortable that female life expectancy here is 94.
sentences.chinese: 由于生活舒适，此地女性的平均寿命高达94岁。

sentences.english: Men live longest in San Marino, where the average life expectancy for a boy born today is 81.
sentences.chinese: 男性平均寿命最长的是圣马力诺，为81岁。

definition: Changshou suburban district of Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
rate of infection (usu. of a disease)
